name: react-tutorial
description: Building an application where all code is written in a single file is (obviously I hope) inadequate (if not read [this](https://medium.freecodecamp.com/javascript-modules-a-beginner-s-guide-783f7d7a5fcc#.ganuff4ku)). In this session we'll be adding a very basic [webpack](https://webpack.js.org/) configuration and split our code into separate files.
